      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Run this class to generate a file named "tokens.txt" with 20,000 random 20 character ALPHANUMERIC tokens. Use Burp Pro sequencer to load this file and run a series of randomness tests. NOTE: be careful not to include any CRLF characters (10 or 13 ASCII) because they'll create new tokens Check to be sure your analysis tool loads exactly 20,000 tokens of 20 characters each.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
